title: Apple mango pie
ingredients: ['5 to 6 Granny Smith apples, peeled, cored and sliced', '3 mangoes, peeled, stone removed and sliced', '225g light brown soft sugar', '5 teaspoons water', '3 teaspoons wholemeal wheat flour', '60g chopped walnuts', '2 (375g) packages ready rolled shortcrust pastry', 'melted butter for brushing']
